message.body: Hey Glenn. Do you know if we are meeting today yet?
Well I just found out that my band mates can practice tonight. So, if you're up for it, I'll see if they're up for meeting after.
Ok, let me check with them. I'll get back to you soon.
Hey Dan, we're good for tonight. Can we try the same plan as last week (el Camino on 2nd)?
Yeah, it's basically across the street from the piazza.
I can probably come by your place and get you . . . if you want.
OK yea that might work. .my roommate might be able to drop me off too
Just curious. Were u planning on paying me half up front today or were you going to wait until we start shooting?
I'd rather wait, at least until we're a bit closer to the shoot, if that's cool.
Apparently, if we wait until 10:00, we'll be there for happy hour. Do you want to have a drink at Brad's house first? Or, we could just meet there at 10:00.
I can just meet at brads. The earlier the better. I usually goto bed around 11 normally anyway. Is that OK?
